org.nd4j.linalg.lossfunctions

Class LossCalculation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.lossfunctions.LossCalculation
  • Deprecated. 
    Use ILossFunction for equivalent functionality. Allows for custom loss functions. Use computeScore with an instance of the loss function classs instead.

    @Deprecated
public class LossCalculation
extends java.lang.Object

      • scoreExamples

        public INDArray scoreExamples()
        Deprecated. 
        Calculate the score for each example individually.
        Returns:
        If labels are shape [miniBatchSize,nOut] then return shape is [miniBatchSize,1] with value at position i being the score for example i
